definitionGroups.group: An act or instance of conveying.

entries.meaning: (archaic) A manner of conveying one's thoughts, a style of communication.
A means of transporting, especially a vehicle.
(law) An instrument transferring title of an object from one person or group of persons to another.

verbs.description: conveyance (third-person singular simple present conveyances, present participle conveyancing, simple past and past participle conveyanced)

entries.meaning: (law, transitive) To transfer (the title) of an object from one person or group of persons to another.
